articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Sketchy Botox shots spark multistate outbreak of botulism-like condition - Ars Technica
articles.description: So far at least six people in two states have fallen ill; four of them were hospitalized.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ A woman in New Jersey receiving a Botox treatment at a Botox party in a New Jersey salon hosted by a radio station.

articles.title: Elemental Surprise: Physicists Discover a New Quantum State - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A novel quantum state, "hybrid topology," was discovered in arsenic crystals by Princeton scientists, merging edge and surface states in a unique quantum behavior. This groundbreaking finding, revealed through advanced imaging techniques, marks a significant …
articles.content: A representation of data visualization of quantum states of electrons on the surface and edge of grey arsenic crystal obtained using a scanning tunneling microscope at Princeton’s physics department.… [+14301 chars]
